# Eslint

Dobux 概念中 state 的修改只能在 Reducer 中进行，为了方便业务使用，在 Effect 中透出了 state 提供使用，为了避免随意修改 state 引起不可预知的错误建议安装 eslint 插件来规范化编码行为

# 安装

  • 使用 yarn
$ yarn add eslint-plugin-dobux --dev
  • 使用 npm
$ npm install eslint-plugin-dobux --save-dev

# 配置

// .eslintrc
{
  "extends": ["react-app", "plugin:dobux/recommended"],
  "plugins": ["dobux"]
}

# 规则

# no-modify-state-in-effect

Succeed

export const counter = {
  state,
  reducers: {
    increase(state: State) {
      state.count++
    },
    decrease(store: any) {
      state.count--
      store.state.count++
    },
  },
  effects: (store: ModelsType['counter'], Models: ModelsType) => ({
    async increaseAsync() {
      await wait(500)
      store.state.count = 10
      store.reducers.increase()
    },
  }),
}

Fail

export const counter = {
  state,
  reducers: {
    increase(state: State) {
      state.count++
    },
    decrease(store: any) {
      state.count--
      store.state.count++
    },
  },
  effects: (store: ModelsType['counter'], Models: ModelsType) => ({
    async increaseAsync() {
      await wait(500)
      store.state.count++
      store.state.count--
      store.reducers.increase()
    },
  }),
}

# no-modify-state-in-function-component

Succeed

import React, { FC } from 'react'
import store from './store'

const Count: FC = () => {
  const { state, reducers, effects } = store.useModel('counter')
  const handleIncrease = () => {
    reducers.increase()
  }
  const handleDecrease = () => {
    reducers.decrease()
  }
  return (
    <div>
      <p>{state.count}</p>
      <button onClick={handleIncrease}>increase</button>
      <button onClick={handleDecrease}>decrease</button>
    </div>
  )
}
export default Count

Fail

import React, { FC } from 'react'
import store from './store'

const Count: FC = () => {
  const { state, reducers, effects } = store.useModel('counter')

  state.count++
  state.count = 123

  return <div></div>
}

export default Count
